entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning. Flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming northwest 20 late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
